commands.title: Replace value in document, runs through code lens

findcssvariableusage.colorSettings.fileP.description: Absolute path to source file that contains color variables

findcssvariableusage.colorSettings.ident.description: If you keep all variables in one file, you will need to set items here so that only color variables are assigned for color matching. You only need to put in partials, an example has been provided

findcssvariableusage.colorSettings.cssPr.description: Set the css properties to analyse for color values here

findcssvariableusage.fontSizeSettings.fi.description: Absolute path to source file that contains font variables

findcssvariableusage.fontSizeSettings.id.description: Set this to a partial of the name of a font size css variable to have font sizes only use similar variables.

findcssvariableusage.fontSizeSettings.cs.description: Array of css properties that will be looked at for matching font size

findcssvariableusage.fontWeightSettings..description: Absolute path to source file that contains font weight variables
Set this to a partial of the name of a font weight css variable to have font weights only use similar variables.
Array of css properties that will be looked at for matching font weight

findcssvariableusage.fontFamilySettings..description: Absolute path to source file that contains font family variables
Set this to the name of the font family css variable to be able to use it
Array of css properties that will be looked at for matching font weight

findcssvariableusage.lineHeightSettings..description: Absolute path to source file that contains line height variables
Set this to a partial of the name of a line height css variable to have line heights only use similar variables.
Array of css properties that will be looked at for matching line height

findcssvariableusage.spacingSettings.fil.description: Absolute path to source file that contains spacing variables

findcssvariableusage.spacingSettings.css.description: Set what css properties are looked at for css variables. By default, margin, padding and gap are selected. You do not need to list all variations of margin or padding, just 'padding' will be enough.

findcssvariableusage.spacingSettings.ide.description: Set this to a partial of the name of a spacing css variable to have spacing's only use similar variables.

findcssvariableusage.borderRadiiSettings.description: Absolute path to source file that contains border radii variables
Set what css properties are looked at for css variables. By default, margin, padding and gap are selected. You do not need to list all variations of margin or padding, just 'padding' will be enough.
Set this to a partial of the name of a spacing css variable to have spacing's only use similar variables.

findcssvariableusage.otherSettings.cssPr.description:
List all css properties this extension will look at across all files. 
This allows for you to remove properties you dont want to look at. 
Similar to spacing, padding and margin look at all variants. 

Because of how this extension is built, you can only remove properties from this array, adding will break it.

scripts.pretest: yarn run compile && yarn run lint
